resname_to_idx
==============

Index of the amino acid types represented by three characters. Order is the same as the order of amino acids in the list of `resnames`.

+--------+-------+
| key    | value |
+========+=======+
| ALA    | 0     |
+--------+-------+
| ARG    | 1     |
+--------+-------+
| ASN    | 2     |
+--------+-------+
| ASP    | 3     |
+--------+-------+
| CYS    | 4     |
+--------+-------+
| GLN    | 5     |
+--------+-------+
| GLU    | 6     |
+--------+-------+
| GLY    | 7     |
+--------+-------+
| HIS    | 8     |
+--------+-------+
| ILE    | 9     |
+--------+-------+
| LEU    | 10    |
+--------+-------+
| LYS    | 11    |
+--------+-------+
| MET    | 12    |
+--------+-------+
| PHE    | 13    |
+--------+-------+
| PRO    | 14    |
+--------+-------+
| SER    | 15    |
+--------+-------+
| THR    | 16    |
+--------+-------+
| TRP    | 17    |
+--------+-------+
| TYR    | 18    |
+--------+-------+
| VAL    | 19    |
+--------+-------+
| UNK    | 20    |
+--------+-------+
